thread.title: N.J. Sports Now: Mets-Cubs on October collision course (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: N.J. Sports Now: Mets-Cubs on October collision course (VIDEO)

author: Joe Giglio | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: N.J. Sports Now: Mets-Cubs on October collision course (VIDEO)
text:
Comments 
In the midst of euphoric fans , derisive chants and home runs flying all over New York and Chicago, it was easy to miss the big picture that took shape on Monday. As the Mets and Cubs pushed closer to a date with destiny, the balance of power shifted in the National League. Your bat-flip champion of the world, Yoenis Cespedes. https://t.co/t6iHkbJTGe â€” Joe Giglio (@JoeGiglioSports) October 13, 2015 
For years, the St. Louis Cardinals, Los Angeles Dodgers and San Francisco Giants have dominated October headlines and faced off for the right to play deep into the NL playoffs. Whether it be now or over the next few years, those days are ending. . @Cubs fans could watch this over, and over, and over, and over, and over, and over ... https://t.co/KZyrtFvnIz 
With the Mets and Cubs on the brink of franchise-changing wins, it's time to look forward to the October rivalry that will become a staple of the sport for the foreseeable future. 
Watch the video above and leave your thoughts below in the comments section!
